Plot: Mild mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.
Title: Identity Thief
Writer: Craig Mazin (screenplay), Jerry Eeten (story), Craig Mazin (story)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Melissa McCarthy, Jon Favreau, Amanda Peet
tomatoConsensus: Identity Thief's few laughs are attributable to Melissa McCarthy and Jason Bateman, who labor mightily to create a framework for the movie's undisciplined plotline.
